sleek.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a vehicle or other object that is sleek has a smooth attractive shape
sleek.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: the sleek lines of the new Mercedes
sleek.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: sleek hair or fur is straight, shiny, and healthy-looking
sleek.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone who is sleek looks rich and is well dressed
sleek.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make hair or fur smooth and shiny by putting water or oil on it
sleek.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: His hair was sleeked back with oil.
